message.content:
Best 10 educational apps for kids:

1. ABCmouse.com: Offers over 10,000 activities covering all subject areas, including reading, math, science and art.

2. Epic!: An extensive digital library with over 40,000 books and educational videos for children up to age 12.

3. PBS Kids Video: Offers a range of high-quality children's programming from PBS.

4. BrainPOP Jr.: Designed for K-3 students, this app has animated videos on various subjects with supporting interactive quizzes and games.

5. Starfall Learn To Read: A well-loved early literacy website that has been expanded into an app offering interactive stories and learning activities focused on phonics skills.

6. Todo Math: Covers over 700 math concepts tailored to individualâ€™s skill levels through engaging missions and challenges

7.startwriteIndia:
Helps in improving Handwriting by providing proper guidelines for enhancing writing skills.
8.Codelearn :
It will educate the bases of code easily from mobile 

9.GrayLab Elements
Free Tablet App Supports Chemistry Education using Periodic Table

10.Jigsaw Puzzle Free Game Helps Develop Their Matching Skills..
